result.eng: We deal with enquiries from the public.
result.ga: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobal
result.orig: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobal
result.html: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúcháin ón phobalWe deal with enquiries from the public.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn muid ag plé le fiosrúċáin ón ṗobalWe deal with enquiries from the public.

result.ga: Dearcadh an phobail i leith na Gaeilge

result.ponchtml: Dearcaḋ an ṗobail i leiṫ na GaeilgeThe public's attitude to Irish.

result.eng: To present the research results to the public.
result.ga: Torthaí na taighde a chur i láthair an phobail

result.eng: The Jewish community is very concerned about this.
result.ga: Tá an pobal Giúdach an-chorraithe faoi seo
result.orig: Tá an pobal Giúdach an-chorraithe faoi seo
result.html: Tá an pobal Giúdach an-chorraithe faoi seoThe Jewish community is very concerned about this.

result.eng: This television station caters for the whole community.
result.ga: Tá an stásiún teilifíse ag freastal ar an phobal uilig

result.eng: She is very active in the Irish-language community in Dublin.
result.ga: Tá sise an-ghníomhach i bpobal na Gaeilge i mBaile Átha Cliath

result.ponchtml: Tá sise an-ġníoṁaċ i bpobal na Gaeilge i mBaile Áṫa CliaṫShe is very active in the Irish-language community in Dublin.

result.eng: They had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.
result.ga: Bhí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíochta a chur os comhair an phobail

result.ponchtml: Ḃí deis acu a gcuid buanna scéalaíoċta a ċur os coṁair an ṗobailThey had a chance to showcase their storytelling talents to the public.

result.eng: That community was worst affected by emigration.
result.ga: Ba ar an phobal sin is mó a thit ualach na heisimirce

result.ponchtml: Ba ar an ṗobal sin is mó a ṫit ualaċ na heisimirceThat community was worst affected by emigration.

result.eng: They gave the Irish-language community something to read.

result.eng: The old barracks are in public ownership now.
